```py
class Point:
    def __init__(self, x, y, z=0): self.x = x; self.y = y  
    def distance(self, other): return (self.x - other.x)**2 + \
    (self.y - other.y)**2 + (self.z - other.z)**2**0.5  
p1 = Point(1, 2); p2 = Point(4, 6, 0)
print(p1.distance(p2)) 
```
